title: Find the Githyanki Creche
content:
ssive Insight check, if successful, will reveal that Ghustil's obsession borders on mania, and if she has knowledge that the parasite remains she'll want to take it. You will have the following dialogue options.

The parasite lives, yes. And thank goodness - it saved her. Your zaith'isk tried to kill Lae'zel. And failed. [DECEPTION] You're wrong. Can't you see it in her eyes? The parasite's dead.

Choosing dialogue 2 leads to Ghustil getting her tools to uncover more about the parasite. Choosing
